name: sphere-node-sdk
description: Officially supported Node.js SDK library for working with the SPHERE.IO HTTP API, with OAuth2 support.
author: Nicola Molinari <nicola.molinari@commercetools.de>

scripts.clean: rimraf dist lib && mkdirp dist lib
scripts.coverage: npm run lint && ./scripts/credentials && cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-node ./node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/sphere-node-sdk.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/sphere-node-sdk.min.js
scripts.test: ./scripts/credentials && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src babel-node test/index.js | tap-spec
scripts.test:ci: browserify -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] test | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test:browser: browserify -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] test | tap-closer | smokestack -b chrome | tap-spec
